name: Fuh-Rin-Ka-Zan
text:
When there are face-up WIND, WATER, FIRE and EARTH monster(s) on the field: Apply 1 of these effects.
â—?Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
â—?Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.
â—?Discard 2 random cards from your opponent's hand.
â—?Draw 2 cards.
